landing.head: Knowledge is power!
landing.subHead: Learn how to make smart trading decisions
landing.subtitle: Take the rich educational content in Traders Academy for your advantage and enter the investment world with steady steps.

circles.text: of graduates work in the financial industry

section-2.head: Smart investors are made smarter
section-2.subtitle: Knowledge is your most valuable asset! That’s why we built a one-of-its kind online academy designed to help you grow as an investor with content tailored to your own personal investing goals and needs. Traders Academy is proud to positively impact plenty of trader’s performances in the markets.

section-3.head: Discover Traders Academy
section-3.subtitle: Traders Academy is the most comprehensive and accessible resource available to today’s online traders. Learn about how markets behave and react, while discovering how a trader’s behavior and reactions are just as important to successful trading.

section-4.head: What they say about us
section-4.subhead: Our users success speaks for itself
section-4.subtitle: Our users success speaks for itself Traders Academy has helped hundreds of novice and experienced traders to hone their skills and take their trades to the next level. With us you will learn new strategies, gain confidence and discipline and get a deeper understanding of technical analysis. Traders Academy will accompany you through your investment journey to help you achieve your goals.

section4Carousel.text: I always used to trade based on my knowledge of world news and events. However, since learning technical analysis and how to read charts properly, I have made successful trades I would never have dreamed of before.

section5Items.title: Academy courses
section5Items.text: Choose the courses that best suit your trading experience and goals from a wide range of educational courses and learn to trade from scratch

section5Items.title: Fundamental Analysis
section5Items.text: find out how news and financial announcements influence market trends

section5Items.title: Training sessions
section5Items.text: Get comprehensive training to understand how the markets work, improve your trading skills and seize the opportunities

section5Items.text: Learn more about charts and tools to better understand the market movements

section5Items.text: Learn trading strategies that have been tested and developed by market experts

section-6.head: Enter the market with
section-6.subhead: the right broker by your side
section-6.subtitle: Traders Academy has proudly partnered with Axia Trade, the award winning broker, to give you an exceptional trading experience. Being a member of Traders Academy will instantly grant you a demo account with Axia Trade and 5 free articles for beginners to get you started.

section-7.head: Our Courses
section-7.subtitle: Stay in the know about investing, from how to get started, to potential opportunities, to the vast world of financial assets.

items.title: Basics of Trading
items.text: The key to successful trading is understanding the basic ideas and principles behind the trading strategies and techniques

items.title: Advanced strategies
items.text: We’ll cover strategies intended to generate income in the portfolio, buy a stock at a desired price and manage risks

items.title: Advanced tools
items.text: Professional traders can handle the market’s volatility with the right trading tools

section-8.head: Get in touch
section-8.subhead: We’re always available for your help.
section-8.subtitle: Contact us should you have any questions or queries and we’ll get back to you ASAP. Don’t forget to let us know how you’re getting on with your trading education.

items.text: Global Village, Jivan’s Complex, Mont Fleuri, Mahe, Seychelles

items.title: Work hours
items.text: Mon – Sat: 9 am – 7 pm, Sunday: CLOSED

fields.label: I have read and agreed to the Terms and conditions

section-9.head: Risk Disclaimer
section-9.subtitle:
Traders Academy is an investment training academy. We offer specialized courses focused on a range of investing subjects, asset classes, and strategies. At Traders Academy, we specialize in providing investing courses for both inexperienced beginners and experienced traders.

Traders Academy is simply an educational service and all materials are expressly designed to educate and should in no way be construed as investment advice or guidance. Trading is risky, and investors should not invest more than they can afford to lose. Before trading, make sure you understand the accompanying and associated risks.

The information contained within this website is not intended for anyone claiming United States residency and citizenship, nor is it intended for use by any person(s) in any country or jurisdiction where such use would be in direct violation or contravention of local regulations and laws.

Traders Academy is owned and operated by Deloce LTD which is a company organized under the laws of Cyprus, company No. 417226.
